title: Number Systems and the Foundations of Analysis
text:
Preface
The aim of this book is to study the basic number system of mathematics using as a principal guide Mendelson (2008) and other supplementary materials.
The idea is to develop all the topics and solve the exercises proposed in Mendelson (2008) as it has done in Mathematical Adventures




Mendelson, Elliott. 2008. Number Systems and the Foundations of Analysis. Mineola, N.Y: Dover Publications.
